titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Department of Economics records, 1999 RG0148
titlestmt.author: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

publicationstmt.publisher: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-05-18 15:03:13 -0400.

repository.corpname: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

did.physloc: Materials may be stored off-site, and may require additional retrieval time. Please contact the Special Collections Research Center for more information.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: As part of the social and behavioral sciences in the Columbian College of Arts and Sciences, the Economics Program covers macroeconomics, microeconomics, labor economics, the economics of industry, international finance, international trade and development, money and banking, the economics of government and public policy and econometrics.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arragned in to one series: Economics of Inmate Labor Participation conference records

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Please cite unpublished materials in the following way: Please provide the title and date of item, catalog number (if applicable it will be found written on the folder), name of the collection, name of the repository, and location of the repository. Example: James Oglethorpe to the Trustees, 13 January 1876, RG0001 Series 1, Box 4, Folder 3. Records of the Board of Trustees, Special Collections Research Center, Gelman Library, The George Washington University, Washington, D.C.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material may be copyrighted or restricted. It is the patron's obligation to determine and satisfy copyright or other case restrictions when publishing or otherwise distributing materials found in the collections.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection curently contains electronic file copies of the papers given at this symposium hosted by the department of economics in 1999, as well as an introduction and summary by Dr. Petersik.

did.unittitle: Economics of Inmate Labor Participation conference records

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains electronic file copies of the papers given at this symposium hosted by the department of economics in 1999, as well as an introduction and summary by Dr. Petersik.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on use
accessrestrict.p: This series contains material that is copyrighted or restricted and will not be made available online. It is the patron's obligation to determine and satisfy copyright or other case restrictions when publishing or otherwise distributing materials found in the collections.
